Package com.jidesoft.editor.marker

The package contains classes for marker area for JIDE Code Editor product.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MarkerEyePainter A painter interface to paint the marker eye area.
MarkerListener MarkerListener is a listener can be added to MarkerModel to listen to any marker changes in marker model.
MarkerModel An interface to store the marker information in an editor.
MarkerStripePainter An interface to paint the marker stripes.
 

Class Summary
DefaultMarkerModel  
Marker Marker represents a range of text in code editor used by the MarkerModel.
MarkerArea MarkerArea is an area next to code editor to display markers for error, warning, or whatever information in the code you would like to display.
MarkerEvent Markerevent is used to notify interested parties that marker has been changed in the MarkerModel.
MarkerEye MarkerEye is a panel to indicate the inspecting status.
MarkerStripe MarkerStripe is a panel to display all the markers in a marker model.
 

Package com.jidesoft.editor.marker Description

The package contains classes for marker area for JIDE Code Editor product.
